h3.style: border-bottom: 4px solid rgb(204, 0, 0); color: rgb(93, 93, 93); font-size: 170%; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; width: 100%;

p.style: color: rgb(88, 88, 88); font-size: 115%; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; line-height: 20px; text-align: center;
p.span: It's a great day in Brahma Nation! Welcome to a place of pride, class, character, and performance -where everyday we work within the context of support from our amazing community as we learn and grow and seek to positively contribute to the world around us. Check out the happenings in BISD by following our Bellville ISD Facebook page.

strong.span: TO RECEIVE FUTURE BISD NEWSLETTERS SIGN UP BY CLICKING HERE.

span.strong: In alignment with the declaration from Governor Abbott, Bellville ISD will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year due to concerns regarding the spread of the Coronavirus Disease 2019. All school-related practices and competitions are cancelled for the duration of the District's closure.

strong.br: Additional information regarding events such as prom and graduation, in addition to processes for returning school issued items and picking-up personal items from school will be shared out later this week.

br.br:
Our team of teachers have prepared online learning resources that distributed through Google Classrooms for all students in all grade levels. Hard-copy packets of learning resources are available for pick-up from campus offices on Tuesdays from 7:30am-11:30am. If you are unable to pick-up instructional resources, please email your child's teacher and we will make arrangements to deliver instructional resources to you. Please continue to check out website for up-to-date information and details.
FOOD SERVICE PROVISION:
BISD Food Services will continue to be provide meals including lunch, snack, and breakfast items to all BISD students. Beginning Monday, April 20, 2020 meals can be picked up from Bellville High School & West End Elementary on Mondays, Tuesdays, & Thursdays from 11:30am-1:00pm. Anyone unable to come to the school to pick-up meals is encouraged to call (979) 865-7071 or email awerner@bellvillebrahmas.org for assistance.
ON-GOING DECISION MAKING:
The BISD Board of Trustees will continue to meet weekly at 9:00am on Wednesdays to review updated information and support the provision of continuity of instruction and food services during the duration of our closure. Updates and details following each meeting will be shared out on our website and Facebook Page.
#STAYWELL:
We ask that our families do their best to support students continued learning at-home during this time. Our teachers are working to prepare and roll-out remote learning resources. A current list of learning tools can be found at www.bellvilleisd.org/health_alerts.
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
2020-2021 BISD Calendar
The BISD Board of Trustees have approved the academic calendar for the 2020-2021 school year. The 2020-2021 Calendar for BISD can be viewed by clicking the link provided HERE.
BISD Course Offerings & Academic Pathways
BISD is providing expanded enrichment opportunities and course offerings for the 2020-2021 school year. To view the new Course Catalog please click HERE. To view an explanatory video regarding the district's work with course scheduling and course offerings please click HERE.

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: latoregular; font-size: 16px;

div.p:
Greetings to All United in Brahma Pride!
It is often said that it takes a village to raise a child and Bellville ISD is fortunate to be part of an amazing village in our Bellville Community. In Bellville we are family which comes with both high expectations and endless support. We aim to cultivate exceptional individuals by connecting students and staff through their passions and interests, giving accountable ownership of purposeful work, and providing timely and meaningful feedback. We are a place of pride, class, and character. We deeply value the contribution of all stakeholders to our present and our future.
Dr. Nicole Poenitzsch
Superintendent
Bellville ISD

div.p: Bellville ISD completed the process of developing a local Innovation Plan with the work and leadership of the District Advisory Council and BISD Board of Trustees. To view the BISD Innovation Plan please click HERE.
